short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Several utils, now help to translate content of clipboard to be some link and open in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provide below features
- help you to review all tabs opened in chrome in a page;
- jump to the interested page by click the jump button.
- store a tab group into bookmarks
- restore bookmarks tab group in a new window

Shortkey
Ctrl+Shift+9 : open the page to review tabs
